thing-type.label: Color Dimmable Light
thing-type.description: Color dimable light supporting ON/OFF, Brightness and Color adjustment

channel-type.label: Power
channel-type.description: The Power ON / OFF channel allows you to turn the power to a light on or off

channel-type.label: Color
channel-type.description: The color channel allows to control the color of a light. It is also possible to dim values and switch the light on and off.

channel-type.label: Brightness
channel-type.description: The brightness channel allows to control the brightness of a light. It is also possible to switch the light on and off.

channel-type.label: Color Temperature
channel-type.description: The color temperature channel allows to set the color temperature of a light from 0 (cold) to 100 (warm).
